name: DriftMace
description:
You are driving a crazy car with a huge mace attached to its back.  The brakes of your car don't work, but you can drift.  Geometrical monsters have infested the place and it's your job to unleash hell. Turn your car Lef t and Right,  to create momentum and swing the mace in the faces of these monsters. Drift in order to gain more control.. You can detach and  launch the mace  further, but you need to get it back afterwards.  You have magnets mounted on your car, so if you get close  enough, the mace will come to you, Mjolnir style.

Chain combos to get extra points and get the highest score possible!

My Highest score is 4500. Can u beat it?

Controls:

Left/Right - Turn

Space - Drift

Left Ctrl - Release Mace

Come close to Mace to pick it up

Destroy the enemies by hitting them with the Mace. Get the Highest score possible.
